"No change even for the festival!":
"Thank you for the other time!
Yup, yup, seems like the settlement house
also came yeah! As the chrome dragon
has appeared, it is definitely in existence, I thought.
...Alright, we shall leave this and proceed to the
next request! When we talk about the
enemy of the ARKS, it is D-Arker!
Let us bring many of them down for the
sake of everyone!
*Target D-Arker of Lv.1 or higher"

"この前はどうもありがとうっ！
うんうん、やっぱり始末屋さんも
来てたみたいだねっ！
クローム・ドラゴンが出てきているから
きっといるんじゃないかって、思ってた。
……さて、それはさておき次のお願い！
アークスの敵と言えば、ダーカーだよね！
みんなのために、たっくさん倒しちゃおう！
※Lv.1～のダーカーが対象"
